## Description {#details}

Helper to parse a REMARK&#95;BLOCK for a bitstream remark container.

Definition at line 54 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h">BitstreamRemarkParser.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### BitstreamRemarkParserHelper() {#aad557da4c58f76f8b5582eb7cbf2699f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BitstreamRemarkParserHelper::BitstreamRemarkParserHelper (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamcursor">BitstreamCursor</a> &amp; Stream)</>}>
Continue parsing with <code>Stream</code>.

<code>Stream</code> is expected to contain a ENTER&#95;SUBBLOCK to the REMARK&#95;BLOCK at the current position. <code>Stream</code> is expected to have a BLOCKINFO&#95;BLOCK set and to have already parsed the META&#95;BLOCK.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h/#l00081">81</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h">BitstreamRemarkParser.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-cpp/#l00085">85</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-cpp">BitstreamRemarkParser.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### parse() {#afe31085cbd69c4097cd149a4ac07c0f5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Error BitstreamRemarkParserHelper::parse ()">
Parse the REMARK&#95;BLOCK and fill the available entries.

This helper does not check for the validity of the fields.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h/#l00085">85</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-h">BitstreamRemarkParser.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-cpp/#l00206">206</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/bitstreamremarkparser-cpp">BitstreamRemarkParser.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
